description:
**This package is not official and is not affiliated with Logitech!** Logitech Camera Settings is a software released by Logitech for configuring their web cameras, such as Logitech BRIO's viewing angle.

This package merely downloads the installer from the official website and runs it. By doing so, you are agreeing to the EULA.

This software appears on the [Downloads page for Logitech BRIO](https://prosupport.logi.com/hc/ru/articles/360039591834-Downloads-BRIO) and lists following compatible products as of 2021-04-13:

* B525 HD Webcam
* BCC950 ConferenceCam
* BRIO
* C505e HD Webcam
* C920e Business Webcam
* C925e Webcam
* ConferenceCam CC3000e
* ConferenceCam Connect
* Connect Kit
* GROUP
* GROUP Kit
* MEETUP
* PTZ PRO 2
* PTZ Pro Camera
* Rally
* Rally Camera
* Webcam C930e
author: Logitech
